play_scene_step_by_tag.helper: This action will play the loaded scene step at tag

rotate_entity_to_entity.helper: This action will rotate a custom entity to another one
rotate_entity_to_entity.name: rotate_entity_to_entity

register_enemy_around_you.helper:
This action will register founded enemies in the player's determined range and filter. 
 The filter will check in the name, display name and appearance of the entity or hash 
 leave filter at [] for take all.
register_enemy_around_you.name: register_enemy_around_you

register_entities_around_you.helper:
This action will register founded entity in the player's determined range and filter. 
 The filter will check in the name, display name and appearance of the entity or hash 
 leave filter at [] for take all.
register_entities_around_you.name: register_entities_around_you

lock_mission.name: lock_mission

add_gang_district_score.help: refer to the quest_mod folder--> data folder--> db folder to find the district.json to use the proper district tag
add_gang_district_score.helperTitle: Gang : Add District or SubDistrict Score

remove_group.helper: This action will remove a group
remove_group.name: remove_group

do_random_dialog.helper: This action will fire a random dialog from the list of your dialog tags. NOTE: Which ever one is in the list, Their Trigger requirements have to be met.
do_random_dialog.name: do_random_dialog

for.helper: This action will execute a list of actions X times
for.name: for

vehicle_chase_entity.helper: This action will make the vehicule chase an entity. Min equal minimum distance, max equal maximum distance
vehicle_chase_entity.name: vehicle_chase_entity

goto.name: goto
goto.helper: This action will set the current action to the index. Useful to go back to a previous action of the list. Parent is for go to the parent action list of this action (if the action is called into a sublist)

if.name: if
if.helper: This action will check a trigger and execute IF actions if the trigger is OK or ELSE action if the trigger is not OK

teleport_group_at_entity_relative_positi.helperTitle: Group : Teleport Group to another entity relative position
teleport_group_at_entity_relative_positi.helper: This action will teleport a group of entity of another one entity's XYZ relative position

teleport_entity_at_relative_position.helper: This action will teleport a custom entity to entity's XYZ relative position
teleport_entity_at_relative_position.name: teleport_entity_at_relative_position

set_score.helper: This action will set a value for a key of a score
set_score.name: set_score

goto_alias.helper: This action will set the current action to another action by an alias. Useful to go back to a previous action of the list. Parent is for go to the parent action list of this action (if the action is called into a sublist)
goto_alias.name: goto_alias

mission.name: mission
